exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language minL : MinimumLanguage L pL : PropositionalLanguage L Gamma : Provable L minAX : MinimumAxiomatization L Gamma ipAX : IntuitionisticPropositionalLogic L Gamma Unable to unify "(let (provable) := ?Gamma in provable) (TT --> ?M2115 <--> ?M2115)" with "(let (provable) := Gamma in provable) (multi_and nil <--> TT)".
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

In environment L : Language minL : MinimumLanguage L pL : PropositionalLanguage L Gamma : Provable L minAX : MinimumAxiomatization L Gamma ipAX : IntuitionisticPropositionalLogic L Gamma a : expr xs : list expr IHxs : |-- multi_and xs <--> fold_right andp TT xs Unable to unify "forall x y : expr, (fun x0 y0 : expr => |-- x0 <--> y0) x y -> Morphisms.respectful (fun x0 y0 : expr => |-- x0 <--> y0) (fun x0 y0 : expr => |-- x0 <--> y0) (andp x) (andp y)" with "(let (provable) := Gamma in provable) (multi_and (a :: xs) <--> a && fold_right andp TT xs)".
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros xs. split. - intros H. induction xs. + simpl. apply truep_impp. + simpl. apply andp_proper_iffp. split. * apply H. * apply IHxs. - intros H. induction xs. + simpl in H. apply H. + simpl in H. apply andp_proper_iffp in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. apply IHxs in H2. auto.
